solution_line_template: This year's total production is {last_year_production} * {production_multiplier} = <<{last_year_production}*{production_multiplier}={current_year_production}>>{current_year_production} phones.
A quarter of this year's production is {current_year_production} / {quarter_denominator} = <<{current_year_production}/{quarter_denominator}={sold_phones}>>{sold_phones} phones.
The number of phones left after selling a quarter of the production is {current_year_production} - {sold_phones} = <<{current_year_production}-{sold_phones}={phones_left}>>{phones_left} phones.
